body: Ok . So if you remove the context surfaces then the non-Convex error should go away. The other problem that I see from your attached image is that the cooling output from read Ep result is not a tree for Export to Open Studio component. That's the reason why you're not able to visualize the results. You'll need to make it output 45 branches like you have from EnergyPlus Component. I am myself wondering why this did not happen automatically.
